CustomField.description: Is Oppty > Campaign > Page Owner State OR if blank, then Oppty >Account Name > Billing State, OR if blank, then Oppty > Primary Contact > Mailing State OR if blank then Oppty > Primary Contact > Other State. Will return blank if all are blank.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Campaign.Page_Owner_State__c) ), Campaign.Page_Owner_State__c, IF( AND( ISBLANK(Campaign.Page_Owner_State__c), NOT( ISBLANK(Account.BillingState) ) ), Account.BillingState, IF( AND( ISBLANK(Campaign.Page_Owner_State__c), ISBLANK(Account.BillingState), NOT( ISBLANK(npsp__Primary_Contact__r.MailingState) ) ), npsp__Primary_Contact__r.MailingState, IF( AND( ISBLANK(Campaign.Page_Owner_State__c), ISBLANK(Account.BillingState), ISBLANK(npsp__Primary_Contact__r.MailingState), NOT( ISBLANK(npsp__Primary_Contact__r.OtherState) ) ), npsp__Primary_Contact__r.OtherState, NULL ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is Oppty > Campaign > Page Owner State OR if blank, then Oppty >Account Name > Billing State, OR if blank, then Oppty > Primary Contact > Mailing State OR if blank then Oppty > Primary Contact > Other State. Will return blank if all are blank.
CustomField.label: Owner State
